tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE HomologyModelingResults (
  model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  protein_name VARCHAR(255),
  sequence TEXT,
  modeling_tool VARCHAR(100),
  score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE homology_models (
    model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    protein_id INT,
    model_file BYTEA,
    model_score FLOAT,
    model_date TIMESTAMP,
    model_author VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE protein_sequences (
    protein_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sequence TEXT,
    sequence_length INT,
    organism_name VARCHAR,
    gene_name VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE HomologyModelingResults (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    protein_id UUID,
    model_name VARCHAR(100),
    model_structure JSONB,
    similarity_score FLOAT
);
